Author: LawrenAnne4
Text: I’ve never been a big wedding person but my fiancé and I are both Italian so it was kind of inevitable. And I know! I have been in recovery for quite some time so I think I’m taking this so hard because I literally did not see it coming. Good luck with your planning!!!

Author: violettheatre
Text: Ugh that sucks, I'm sorry. I thought I wouldn't have to go through that because I'm not into weddings at all and was planning on just eloping/having a lowkey party but me and my partner have been talking about it and he kinda wants a wedding so now I am pre-stressing about all of this stuff too. Events with photos normally suck, but an event where most of the photos are specifically supposed to include me and I can't just hide out of range?? No thank you!!
